main_definition: Extremely interesting or captivating, causing one to be deeply engaged in interest.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Intriguing and compelling; holding the attention of someone with a lot of interest
meanings_and_examples.example: The documentary about ancient Egypt was absolutely fascinating, I couldn't take my eyes off the screen.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Pertaining to something that is surprising or unexpectedly interesting
meanings_and_examples.example: The magician's performance was truly fascinating; it was full of amazing tricks and illusions.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Captivating in a way that makes you want to learn more about the subject
meanings_and_examples.example: She has an incredibly fascinating collection of vintage coins, each with its own unique story.
